Title: Ukraine Map
Description: "Our visualization of Ukraine conflict maps presents a comprehensive amalgamation of intricate data sourced from different portals. - Conflict violence data from ACLED, each dot depicts a record of battles, explosions/remote violence, protests, riots, strategic developments and violence against civilians - Deaths data from UCDP, covering deaths from state-based conflict, non-state conflict and one-sided conflict. - Ethnic makeup data from EPR, contributing critical context to the conflict. - Power Plants locations from global power plant database and OECD - Humanitarian corridors from research by PeaceRep and partners Together, these multi-faceted layers provide a rich and detailed representation of the complex dynamics and human impact of the Russian-Ukraine War."
Data: ACLED, UCDP, Humanitarian Corridors, Power Plants, Ethic Make Up
Sarah Schöttler, Benjamin Bach (UoE) , 2022 | Niamh Henry

Title: Timelines of Institutional Change
Description: Interactive timelines to illustrate the formal change process in a selected country, including: peace agreements, local agreements, constitutional events, amnesties, elections, coups & other relevant events
Data: PA-X, colpus, constitute, NELDA, other election data
Niamh Henry, Sanja Badanjak, Christine Bell

Title: Process Overview Dashboard
Description: Interactive data report/dashboard to provide a snapshot of high-level process data from PA-X - can see for all of PA-X or select specific countries or processes, or types of agreements. Can see number of agreements, types of agreements, the stage they were introduced, a timeline of agreements and a snapshot look at the key issues addressed in the agreement contents.

Title: Peace Impacts Dashboard(s)
Description: Interactive data report/dashboard to provide insights into the impacts the process has had on the general experiences in the country, across conflict, security, political, economic and humanitarian data indicators.
Data: PA-X V8 and all postgres data

Title: Agreement - Actor Networks
Description: Interactive agreement-actor networks where nodes can be actors or agreements, and connected if they were a party or third party signatory to an agreement. When click on an agreement can see information on it and a link to the full text as well as highlight all who signs it. When click an actor can see information on them, and a list of agreements they are signatories to.

Title: South Sudan Perceptions of Peace Survey
Description: This interactive data report presents insights and key findings from a longitudinal survey on Perceptions of Peace in South Sudan by PeaceRep, Detcro, USIP and partners. The four-wave survey collection recorded the views of 13,326 respondents across 29 locations in South Sudan (covering 15 ADM2 areas and 9 ADM1 areas). Respondents were asked questions about their daily experiences of safety based on indicators of ‘everyday peace’ developed through focus groups. They also shared their views on a wide range of related topics, including levels and perceptions of peace in South Sudan, and their views on elections, governance arrangements, security arrangements, trust in public authorities, civic space, national identity, and social cohesion, among others.
Niamh Henry, Jan Pospisil and Partners

Title: Children and Youth in Peace Agreements
Description: This interactive data report presents references to children and/or youth in peace agreements signed between 1990 and 2022. This dataset has drawn on 348 peace agreements in PA-X, which code for general references to children and/or youth. Using this data, the Children and Youth in Peace Agreements dataset further codes these provisions into specific topics. Coded topics include child soldiers, children’s rights, children and transitional justice, children and third-party actors and children and references to their inclusion, protection and provision.
Data: subset of PA-X that has been expanded

Title: PA-X Data Report(s)
Description: Have done initial v8 data report but always a goal to do automated reports of the tracker data/pax data if want to generate report on topics etc

Title: Dialogue Mapping - Ukraine
Description: Over the course of the conflict there have been a number of published proposals for peace, from external countries or groups of country, and also some forms of agreement reached that include Ukraine and Russia, with respect to dimensions of the conflict. Based on Cindy Wittke's work on ‘Islands of civility' [see report] we set out the agreements and proposals, to explore: (a) what topics they deal with (b) where there is overlap in topics (c) who has signed agreements that deal with dimensions of the conflict, where agreement has been reached. The tool also provides a short narrative of each talk topic or agreement, and easy access to the relevant documents and basic background information.

Title: Practical Third Parties Dashboard
Description: Have subset of PAA-X data that looks at practical/de-facto third parties. Have made a dashboard to explore the data by actor or process and see overall trends.
Data: Practical Third Party Signatories data (PAA-X Subset)
